text: Måneskin (, ; ) is an Italian rock band from Rome. == Members == The group has lead vocalist Damiano David, bassist Victoria De Angelis, guitarist Thomas Raggi, and drummer Ethan Torchio. == History == The band rose to fame after ending up second in the eleventh season of the Italian talent show X Factor in 2017. The band won the Sanremo Music Festival 2021 and the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 as the Italian representative with the song "Zitti e buoni". ==References== Category:2016 establishments in Italy Category:Alternative rock bands Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners Category:Italian musical groups Category:LGBT musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 2016 Category:Pop rock bands Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: Måneskin
